 How to grid search deep learning model hyperparameters to ensure that you are getting
good performance from a given model.
 How to prepare data and develop deep learning models for forecasting a range of univariate
time series problems with diﬀerent temporal structures.
 How to prepare data and develop deep learning models for multi-step forecasting a
real-world household electricity consumption dataset.
